StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetOrienta.onEvent]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
--@PointOfContactID integer, --@En.tyTypeID integer AS SET NOCOUNT ON BEGIN --ContactName is a generalize name for any person or place SELECT
--These columns may be needed by the data contracts for insert/update oe.[FiscalYear], e.[EventID], e.[EventType], e.[EventName], hs.[HighSchool_Name] AS CollegeName,
hs.[HighSchool_Name], oe.[EventDate], oe.[Remarks],
ec.[Coordina.onBeginDate], ec.[MaterialsDueDate],ec.[OSTPar.cipa.on], ec.[RequiredLogis.cs],
RTRIM (pc.POCLastName) + ',' + RTRIM(pc.POCFirstName) + '.' + IsNull(substring(pc.POCLegalMiddleName,1,1),'') + '.' AS POCName, [POCLastName], [POCLegalMiddleName], [POCFirstName], [TelephoneNumber]
FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[Orienta.onEvent] ore inner join [MCRISS].[USMC].[Organiza.onEvent] oe ON ore.Organiza.onEventID = oe.Organiza.onEventID inner join [MCRISS].[USMC].[Event] e ON e.EventID = oe.EventID le. outer join [MCRISS].[USMC].[EventCoordina.on] ec ON ec.Coordina.onEventID = oe.Coordina.onEventID le. outer join [MCRISS].[USMC].[PointOfContact] pc ON pc.PointOfContactID = oe.PointOfContactID le. outer join [MCRISS].[dbo].High_School hs ON hs.SCHOOL_CODE = oe.CollegeID --inner join [MCRISS].[USMC].[EventCost] eco ON oe.EventCostID = oe.EventCostID --inner join [MCRISS].[USMC].[EventDate] ed ON oe.EventDateID = oe.EventDateID
END
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
